Translations.Text: They cannot bring about the end of a community before the appointed time, nor can they delay it

Then We sent Our Messengers one after another. Whenever their Messenger came to a people, they denied he was the divine Messenger sent to them. So We made one community succeed another to doom and We got them mentioned in tales. And so, people, who believed not, perished
And then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron, with Our signs and a clear mandate
We sent them to Pharaoh and his chieftains, but they behaved haughtily and they were an egoist people
And they said, "What! Shall we believe in two men like us and their people are in our service
So they rejected the two and became of those who were destroyed
And We did give Moses the Book to guide them
And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign. And We gave them shelter on a lofty quiet ground with springs
Allah told every Messenger, "Eat of the things that are good and wholesome, and act righteously. I do indeed know what you do
And, indeed, this community of yours, is one single community. And I am the Lord of you all! Do take due heed of Me, then
But they divided themselves into communities pursuing different ways scripturewise. People of every sect are happy with what they have
So leave them with their delusions for a while
Do they think that by helping them with wealth and children
We are giving good things to them in a hurry? Nay, they do not perceive (that Allah is only testing them therewith)
Indeed those that are, out of fear of their Lord, on their guard against evil
And those that believe in the Verses/signs of their Lord
And those that do not worship anything or anyone other than their Lord
